RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARPES HILL with the pace from the start while three wide, vied between rivals through the turn and into the stretch, bit tight nearing the furlong marker, spirited duel late closest to the inside, found more in the waning strides to prove best in game fashion. TWOFEXUSNEXUS last away, moved up to contest the pace four wide into the turn, three wide when holding a slight advantage into the lane, dueled outside the winner to the wire, outfinished, well clear of the others. JOSIE'S PRIORITY moved up inside to also contest the issue early, continued to race with the lead pack while saving ground turn, weakened final furlong. TRUE CRIMSON fell back to trail after the start, saved some ground turn, steered out past the furlong marker, found some late energy to be gaining for the show spot. ALL COUNTRY broke with the winner, raced with the pace while between horses for three furlongs and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Josie's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside to vie, weakened rail

ENTRY.NAME: All Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with the winner, with pace btwn foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Harpes Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start, vied btwn foes turn, long drive, found more

ENTRY.NAME: Twofexusnexus
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to vie 4w into turn, dueled late, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: True Crimson
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail,moved out, gaining show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 67. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming At A Mile Or Over Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I BEAR ARMS allowed the pace to go early, began to advance three wide far turn, challenged on the outside when straightened for home, dueled, proved best under firm handling. THE CALLING STONE took over soon after the start, set the pace under restraint along the inside, responded when challenged second turn, late duel inside the winner, proved stubborn to the end. WORLD OF HURT fell back to trail after the start, angled out four wide in the final turn, widest in the drive, along for the show. UNIFIED LOVE pressed the runner up off the inside, advanced and challenged that one second turn, briefly vied between the top two into the lane, fell back, dropped in a furlong out and continued to weaken. GEAUX VOTE in the second flight for a half, fell back after five furlongs and trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Geaux Vote
ENTRY.OWNER: The Peach Pit LLC and Abbott Barbara
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight for a half, fell back after five furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: World of Hurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, angled out 4w 2nd turn, along 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: The Calling Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: took over early, pace, rated, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: I Bear Arms
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed pace to go, 3w advance 2nd turn, bid, dueled, best

ENTRY.NAME: Unified Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, bid 2nd turn, weakened, dropped in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 48. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATALANTA ASTERIA broke in and a tad slow, outrun for five furlongs, began to advance far turn, angled out four wide turning into the stretch, closed with good energy to win going away well out in the strip. ZIPPING MOLLY broke alertly, set the pace while toward but not on the rail, continued to show the way up the backstretch, shrugged off a couple of rivals turning for home to garner a larger lead, proved no match for the winner late, remained clear for the place. LOVE CREED tracked the pace toward the inside, moved a bit closer along the rail late in the final turn, steadied when attempting to slip through along the rail, weakened through the stretch. SHEEZA PRIORITY prompted the runner up from the outside, continued to race closest to that one up the backstretch, lodged a brief lead in the three path turning for home and faltered. SADIE'S PORT settled off the pace, moved a bit closer along the inside far turn, flattened out in the drive. BITSY'S DOUBLE DAY forwardly placed early off the inside, began a steady retreat before a half, fell far back, distanced after losing contact with the field, jogged in. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF ZIPPING MOLLY AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE EXITING THE TURN, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Zipping Molly
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, pace off rail, shook off foe, larger lead,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Love Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace toward inside, closer rail 1/4,asked,std'd, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sheeza Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3p, brief bid 3w 1/4, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Bitsy's Double Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, steady fade, distanced

ENTRY.NAME: Atalanta Asteria
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in and tad slow, outrun early, angled 4w, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie's Port
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, bit closer inside 2nd, flattened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 94. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 12, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY MAN LOUIE forwardly placed while racing off the inside, came three wide out of the turn to lose some ground to the leader, set down, late surge to win going away late. CREEKMORE raced back off the pace and the inside, roused, steered in upper stretch when advancing, moved all the way to the rail, flattened out a bit late but managed to gain the nod for the place. COROT broke with the leaders, dueled up front closest to the inside, disposed of the other speed to be clear by upper stretch, continued to lead until late, could not contain the winner, lost the nod for the place at the wire while outside the runner up. LODE OF BLARNEY lacked speed outside, four wide into the lane, failed to muster a rally. FAREWELL TIME broke alertly, dueled up front in the two path, continued to alternate through the turn, first to blink entering the stretch. THE FEATURE off a step slow, trailed throughout in failing to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Corot
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders, dueled into, thru turn, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Farewell Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled 2p, 1st to blink

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Louie
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed off rail, 3w into lane, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: Creekmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, steered in upper, improved, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: The Feature
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lode of Blarney
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, four wide exiting turn, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 12, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCHNELL with the pace from the start, dueled into and through the turn off the inside, shook off the other speed when entering the stretch and kicked well clear. QUANA DUDE lacked speed for a half, asked along midway on the turn, swung out five wide turning for home, finished willingly to be well clear of the rest, no threat to the winner. FIFTEEN LOVE BACK within striking distance off the inside, three wide through the turn, lacked a closing punch, saved the show while not a match for the top pair. BROAD DECISION last to leave, void of speed outside, raced four wide through the turn, improved position while not a serious threat. LT. BONURA vied up front while between foes up the backstretch, fell back into the turn, had little left for the stretch run. PRAY IDE SING broke alertly, narrowly set the pace for a half along the inside, gave way. CUSTOM KAT made little impact in remaining back. I'LL RAISE YOU within striking distance for a half, faltered in the drive. GOLDEN PASSAGE was finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Quana Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, asked mid turn, swung out 5w,willing 2nd,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact in remaining back

ENTRY.NAME: Pray Ide Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, with early pace half inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Passage
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front early between foes, fell back into turn

ENTRY.NAME: Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start, dueled, kicked well clear

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Raise You
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance for a half, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Broad Decision
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, 4w turn,improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Fifteen Love Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance 3w, lacked punch, saved show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZERO POINT ZERO broke on top, set the pace along the inside, shrugged off nearest pursuer when straightened for home, clear to the wire under steady handling. APRIORITY GIRL pressed the winner from the outside, could not match that one in the drive, fully extended to save the place. BRIGHTNMORNINGSTAR void of speed, raced three wide through the turn, getting to the runner up late. ASTRO FLASH broke behind leaders, raced within striking distance for three furlongs, had little for the drive. MAEMAEMAY refused at the start. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND.

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Point Zero
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace inside, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Maemaemay
ENTRY.COMMENT: refused at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Astro Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke behind leaders, within striking distance, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed winner outside, no match stretch, all out save 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Brightnmorningstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed,3w turn, getting to runner up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRANQUILLA outrun in the early going, raced three wide into the turn, four to five wide exiting when beginning to rally, rolled by the two leaders under a brisk left handed crop to be clear at the end. REQUITE THE EFFORT broke very sharp to be immediately clear, continued to show the way through the turn and into the stretch, proved no match for the winner late while proving determined for the place. CHUCHI in the second flight outside, shifted out a bit to the two path turning for home, lodged a bid outside the runner up with a furlong to run, outkicked by that one for the second spot while also no match for the winner. RUN DREAMING one paced off the inside, came three wide for the drive, continued evenly to the finish in lacking a closing kick. KRAZY KATIE within striking distance out in the strip, four wide into the stretch, lacked a closing punch. JAX'S STARRY BRIDE lacked speed, was floated out six wide into the stretch, failed to muster a rally. TOUCHING ACES veered out at the break, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Chuchi
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, moved out, bid, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tranquilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, 4-5w into lane, rolled by leaders

ENTRY.NAME: Run Dreaming
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off the inside, 3w into lane, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Krazy Katie
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w 1/4, lacked punch drive

ENTRY.NAME: Jax's Starry Bride
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, floated 6w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Requite the Effort
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke very sharp, cleared, no match late, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Touching Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out, broke slowly, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden And Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALEXIS S outrun in the early going, rolled up five wide into contention exiting the turn, kicked on strongly to be well clear at the end in a sharp effort. DOUBLE EDGE SWORD within striking distance outside, four wide through the turn, inside the winner entering the stretch, proved no match for that one in the final furlong, edged clear for the place. HALF FULL broke alertly, set a pressured pace up the backstretch and through the in the two path, came in a bit to tighten up FAHAN slightly with a furlong to run, narrowly saved the show over that one late. FAHAN forwardly placed along the inside, continued to save ground into the lane, steadied along the rail in midstretch, altered course to the outside after recovering and finished willingly to narrowly miss the show. RELIC HUNTER with the early pace between foes, fell back into the turn, three wide when behind the lead pack turning for home, steered out, finished up mildly. COPTER bobbled at the break, quickly recovered to force the issue up front for three furlongs then gave way. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE STRETCH RUN, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Fahan
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward and inside, bit tight, steadied 1/8,willing late

ENTRY.NAME: Relic Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: early foot, fell back into the turn, steered out, mildly late

ENTRY.NAME: Copter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, pressed for three furlongs, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Alexis S
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early, rolled up 5w into lane, strongly clear

ENTRY.NAME: Half Full
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, narrowly set pace, came in bit 1/8, just saved 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Double Edge Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w turn, no match, edged clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: NATE'S REVENGE mid pack early out in the strip, began a good gain while four wide late in the turn, challenged on the outside into the stretch, put a head in front past the furlong marker and edged clear. IT'S A BIRD broke in, raced back, three wide into the lane, traffic past the furlong marker, good resolve late to be up for the place. BRYKEN N MITCHELL raced in mid pack, three to four wide late in the turn, improved position while outkicked for the place late. CARRIES MAN off a step slow, void of early foot, five wide through the turn, improved position while well out in the strip. MEAN CRUISER fell back after an alert break, continued back turn, steered in through some traffic midstretch to also better his position. FUNNY ACTOR chased the early leader from along the inside, closer into the lane, tired through the stretch. TIZ THE BIG ONE in the second flight off the inside, also collared the tiring early leader in upper stretch, challenged between horses with a furlong to run then faltered late. COURAGEOUS TIMMY broke back,devoid of speed for over a half, came five wide for the drive, passed tiring rivals. SLOW away well, fell back to mid pack tired through the lane. XIETELEHUAS was never involved. MR LIBERTY bothered a bit at the break, was used to clear off by a wide margin, stopped in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Courageous Timmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back,devoid of speed, 5w into lane, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bryken N Mitchell
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w into lane,outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz the Big One
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, bid btwn midstretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Liberty
ENTRY.OWNER: Nirvana Farm LLC and Minten Craig
ENTRY.COMMENT: bother break, used, clear, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: It's a Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, back off the pace, traffic midstretch, up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Carries Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, void of speed, 5w turn, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Nate's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, 4w gain into lane, outside bid, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Xietelehuas
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Slow
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, mid pack, tired stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, steered in stretch,improved
